title: Lenses
body:
The Madeirans Manuel Constantino, António da Gama, Belchior de Teive, João António Monteiro, João da Silveira Caldeira, Francisco Justino Gonçalves de Andrade, and João Jacinto Gonçalves de Andrade were professors abroad, at universities or higher education institutions. Some of them also taught at the University of Coimbra.

In national higher education institutions, the following Madeirans taught courses:

University of Coimbra: Luis Gonçalves da Câmara and António João de França Bettencourt, at the Faculty of Theology; Vitúrio Lopes Rocha, José Ferreira Pestana, Augusto de Arzila Fonseca, and José Vicente Martins Gonçalves, at the Faculty of Mathematics; Jacinto António de Sousa, at the Faculty of Philosophy; and Nicolau Francisco Xavier da Silva and Justino António de Freitas, at the Faculty of Law.

University of Lisbon: Francisco Luis Pereira de Sousa, José de Freitas Teixeira Espinola Castelo Branco, José Joaquim de Freitas Abreu Rego, José Julio Rodrigues, and Francisco Maria Henriques, at the former Polytechnic School, now the Faculty of Sciences; Luis da Câmara Pestana, António Aurelio da Costa Ferreira, and Marck Athias at the former Medical-Surgical School, now the Faculty of Medicine; Jaime Constantino de Freitas Moniz, at the former Higher Course of Letters, now the Faculty of Letters; and Jaime Boaventura de Azevedo, at the former Higher Institute of Agronomy, now the Faculty of Agronomy.

University of Porto: Urbano Canuto Soares, at the Faculty of Letters.

War School: Manuel da Costa Dias.

Naval School: António Aluisio Jérvis de Atouguia and Alfredo Rodrigues Gaspar.

Medical School of Funchal: Luiz Henriques, António da Luz Pita, Juvenal Honorio de Ornelas, António Alves da Silva, Conde de Canavial, João Augusto Teixeira, Mauricio Augusto Sequeira, and Nuno Silvestre Teixeira.
